trans-unit.source: A simple Python 3 GUI framework.
trans-unit.target: Un simple marco de trabajo de Python 3 GUI.

trans-unit.source: Example Programs
trans-unit.target: Programas de ejemplo

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: Instalación

trans-unit.source: It allows you to express the layout of your GUI in terms of Python lists and dicts, enabling a much more declarative and easy to read (and maintain) coding style.
trans-unit.target: Permite expresar la disposición de su GUI en términos de listas y dictados en Python,permitiendo un estilo de codificación mucho más declarativo y fácil de leer (y mantener).

trans-unit.source: It lets the same high-level code work with a number of different underlying GUI toolkits. Currently supported: Qt 5, PySide 2, Qt 4, PySide, KDE 4, and wxPython. (The original reason for writing this sub-package was that wxWidgets doesn’t use Qt and I like the Qt/KDE widgets better, but Qt was not available for Windows and I wanted code that would run cross-platform.) Note that the KDE 4 and wxPython toolkits are untested at this time.
trans-unit.target: It lets the same high-level code work with a number of different underlying GUI toolkits. Currently supported: Qt 5, PySide 2, Qt 4, PySide, KDE 4, and wxPython. (The original reason for writing this sub-package was that wxWidgets doesn’t use Qt and I like the Qt/KDE widgets better, but Qt was not available for Windows and I wanted code that would run cross-platform.) Note that the KDE 4 and wxPython toolkits are untested at this time.

trans-unit.source: Note: PLIB3.GUI works with Python 3. If you are using Python 2.7, see the PLIB.GUI package, available at https://pypi.python.org/pypi/plib.gui.
trans-unit.target: Note: PLIB3.GUI works with Python 3. If you are using Python 2.7, see the PLIB.GUI package, available at https://pypi.python.org/pypi/plib.gui.

trans-unit.source: at a shell prompt from the directory into which you unzipped the source tarball (the same directory that this README file is in). This will install PLIB3 and then run each of the post-install scripts in the scripts directory.
trans-unit.target: en un intérprete de comandos del directorio en el que descomprimiste el tarball de origen (el mismo directorio en el que está este archivo README).Esto instalará PLIB3 y luego ejecutará cada uno de los scripts de post-instalación en el directorio de scripts.

trans-unit.source: post-install script does most of the work to enable this–so you only need to override if you don’t like the default), you should not have to worry about any toolkit internal details; the goal of this sub-package is to make them all look the same to your code.
